committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide the US postal service to release issue and sell postage stamps commemorating Chanukah.

summary.text: Directs the Postal Service to issue postage stamps commemorating the Jewish holiday of Chanukah.

titles.title: A bill to provide the US postal service to release issue and sell postage stamps commemorating Chanukah.
